trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> column that hosts <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox"></xref> controls in its cells.
trans-unit.target: 代表<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>裝載的資料行<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox"></xref>中其儲存格的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use DataGridCheckBoxColumn to display columns of Boolean data as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>.
trans-unit.target: 使用 DataGridCheckBoxColumn <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>以顯示資料的布林資料行

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows an example of DataGridCheckBoxColumn.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示 DataGridCheckBoxColumn 的範例。

trans-unit.source: ![A DataGridCheckBox column](~/add/media/wpf-datagrid-checkbox.png "A DataGridCheckBox column") To populate the column, bind the column to the data by using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ![DataGridCheckBox 資料行](~/add/media/wpf-datagrid-checkbox.png "DataGridCheckBox 資料行")來填入資料行，資料行繫結至資料使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding%2A> property is applied to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox> element created in the column.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding%2A>屬性會套用到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>建立資料行中的項目。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> for the element in each cell is the data item for the row the cell is in.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>每個資料格中的項目是資料列儲存格的資料項目是。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, to set up the binding you only have to set the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，若要設定繫結只需要設定<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Optionally, you can specify a <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Converter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> if your data source and target are different types.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇性地指定<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Converter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>如果您的資料來源和目標是不同的型別。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Converter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about data binding, see [Data Binding (WPF)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需資料繫結的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結 (WPF)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can customize the DataGridCheckBoxColumn by setting properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Width%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn.IsThreeState%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.IsReadOnly%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定屬性，例如自訂 DataGridCheckBoxColumn <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Width%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn.IsThreeState%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.IsReadOnly%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.IsReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn.IsThreeState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to display other types of data, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> provides the following column types: |Column Type|Data Display| |-----------------|------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridHyperlinkColumn>|Use to display URI data.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn>|Use to display enumeration data.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn>|Use to display text.| If you want to use other controls in your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>, you can create your own column types by using <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要顯示其他類型的資料，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>會提供下列資料行類型: |資料行類型 |資料顯示 | |-----------------|------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridHyperlinkColumn>|用來顯示資料的 URI。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn>|用來顯示列舉型別資料。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn>|用於顯示文字。 | 如果您想要在程式中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>，您可以建立自己的資料行型別使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>使用其他控制項</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridHyperlinkColumn></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.EditingElementStyle*> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得預設值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.EditingElementStyle*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.EditingElementStyle*>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the style.
trans-unit.target: 物件，表示樣式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.ElementStyle*> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得預設值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.ElementStyle*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.ElementStyle*>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the style.
trans-unit.target: 物件，表示樣式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox"></xref> control that is bound to the column's <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding*> property value.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox"></xref>控制項繫結至資料行的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding*>屬性值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding*>

trans-unit.source: The cell that will contain the generated element.
trans-unit.target: 資料格將會包含產生的項目。

trans-unit.source: The data item represented by the row that contains the intended cell.
trans-unit.target: 項目包含預期的資料格的資料列所代表的資料。

trans-unit.source: A new check box control that is bound to the column's <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding*> property value.
trans-unit.target: 新繫結至資料行的核取方塊控制項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding*>屬性值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox"></xref> control that is bound to the column's <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding*> property value.
trans-unit.target: 取得唯讀<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox"></xref>控制項繫結至資料行的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding*>屬性值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding*>

trans-unit.source: The cell that will contain the generated element.
trans-unit.target: 資料格將會包含產生的項目。

trans-unit.source: The data item represented by the row that contains the intended cell.
trans-unit.target: 項目包含預期的資料格的資料列所代表的資料。

trans-unit.source: A new, read-only check box control that is bound to the column's <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding*> property value.
trans-unit.target: 繫結至資料行的新、 唯讀核取方塊控制項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding*>屬性值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the hosted <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox"></xref> controls enable three states or two.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否裝載<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox"></xref>控制項可讓三種狀態或兩個。

trans-unit.source: The IsThreeState property lets you use a nullable Boolean as the data type and has the same functionality as the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.IsThreeState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property on <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>.
trans-unit.target: IsThreeState 屬性可讓您使用可為 null 的布林值，因為資料類型且擁有與<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.IsThreeState%2A?displayProperty=fullName><xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>屬性</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.IsThreeState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>相同的功能

trans-unit.source: The three states for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.IsChecked%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox> control are `true`, `false`, and `null`.
trans-unit.target: 您的三個狀態<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.IsChecked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>控制項是`true`， `false`，和`null`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.IsChecked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the hosted controls support three states; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if they support two states.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果裝載的控制項都支援三種狀態。，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果它們支援兩種狀態。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn.IsThreeState*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn.IsThreeState*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn.IsThreeState*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Called when a cell in the column enters editing mode.
trans-unit.target: 資料行中的儲存格進入編輯模式時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> control calls the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.PrepareCellForEdit%2A> method when a cell in a column derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn> enters editing mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>控制呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.PrepareCellForEdit%2A>方法時的資料行中的資料格衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn>進入編輯模式。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.PrepareCellForEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn> class overrides this method to respond immediately to the user gesture by updating the value in the hosted <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn>類別會覆寫這個方法，以更新裝載中的值以立即回應使用者筆勢<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: This immediate response is necessary because a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn> cell enters edit mode with the same user gesture that changes the state of its hosted <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此立即的回應是必要因為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn>儲存格進入編輯模式，與相同的使用者筆勢，變更其裝載的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>的狀態</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: The element that the column displays for a cell in editing mode.
trans-unit.target: 資料行會顯示資料格在編輯模式下的項目。

trans-unit.source: Information about the user gesture that is causing a cell to enter editing mode.
trans-unit.target: 造成的儲存格進入編輯模式之使用者筆勢的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: The unedited value.
trans-unit.target: 未編輯的值。

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the contents of a cell in the column in response to a column property value change.
trans-unit.target: 重新整理的資料行的屬性值變更的回應中的資料行中的資料格的內容。

trans-unit.source: The cell to update.
trans-unit.target: 若要更新資料格。

trans-unit.source: The name of the column property that has changed.
trans-unit.target: 已變更的資料行屬性的名稱。
